cmp: 亲 (dear/intimate/parent/relation/closely related, parents-in-law of one's offspring)
mng: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1], surname Xin

exm.mng: to replace the old with new, to renew, to renovate, to upgrade, to update, to regenerate
innovation, to bring forth new ideas, to blaze new trails
to renovate, to refurbish, to refresh (computer window), to write a new page (in history), to break (a record)
